original_text: “What are you to me, O Tyre and Sidon, and all the regions of Philistia? Are you paying me back for something? If you are paying me back, I will return your payment on your own head swiftly and speedily.
korean_text: 두로와 시돈과 블레셋 사방아 너희가 나와 무슨 상관이 있느냐 너희가 내게 보복하겠느냐 만일 내게 보복하면 너희가 보복하는 것을 내가 신속히 너희 머리에 돌리리니

sentences.original_text: and all the regions of Philistia?
Are you paying me back for something?
If you are paying me back,
I will return your payment on your own head swiftly and speedily.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 신속하고 속히 너희의 보응을 너희 머리로 돌려주리라.
